nodes.text: Randus Codille was a human who served as an officer in the Canto Bight Police Department. In the C.R.C. year 8010, Officer Codille visited a crime scene and investigated a disabled valet droid.

Randus Codille was first mentioned in the canon reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo and published in 2018. An illustration by Gunship Revolution depicts the crime scene with the disabled droid, but it is not specified which officer is Codille.
